content.text:
# 2001 President's Cup – Doubles

Julien Boutter   Dominik Hrbatý
| runner   =  Marius Barnard   Jim Thomas
| score    = 6–4, 3–6, [13–11]
| edition  =
| type     = singles doubles
}}
Justin Gimelstob and Scott Humphries were the defending champions but did not compete that year.
Julien Boutter and Dominik Hrbatý won in the final 6–4, 3–6, [13–11] against Marius Barnard and Jim Thomas.
Seeds
Champion seeds are indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which those seeds were eliminated.
Thomas Shimada /  Myles Wakefield (first round)
# Marius Barnard /  Jim Thomas (final)
# Julien Boutter /  Dominik Hrbatý (champions)
# Tomáš Cibulec /  Petr Luxa (first round)
}}
